# Enlarge Person, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (powdered iron)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One humanoid creature

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 82

*Your intended subject begins to grow rapidly as you complete the spell.*

This spell functions like *[[Enlarge Person (Spell)|enlarge person]]*, except as noted above.
